net.corda.core.serialization

Interface SerializeAsToken

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNetworkMapService, AbstractNode, AbstractNodeService, ArtemisMessagingComponent, ArtemisMessagingServer, BFTValidatingNotaryService, CordaRPCClient, E2ETestKeyManagementService, FlowLogicRefFactory, InMemoryIdentityService, InMemoryNetworkMapCache, InMemoryNetworkMapService, MonitoringService, Node, NodeClock, NodeMessagingClient, NodeSchedulerService, NodeSchemaService, NodeVaultService, NotaryService, PersistentKeyManagementService, PersistentNetworkMapService, PersistentUniquenessProvider, RaftUniquenessProvider, RaftValidatingNotaryService, NotaryChange.Service, DataVending.Service, SimpleNotaryService, SingletonSerializeAsToken, StorageServiceImpl, TestClock, ValidatingNotaryService

    public SerializeAsToken

    This interface should be implemented by classes that want to substitute a token representation of themselves if they are serialized because they have a lot of internal state that does not serialize (well).

    This models a similar pattern to the readReplace/writeReplace methods in Java serialization.
